sentence.Network_en: In choosing a partner we are subconsciously assessing their evolutionary fitness to be a mother of children or father provider and protector.
sentence.Network_cn: 在选择伴侣的时候,我们会在潜意识里衡量对方将来是否会是称职的母亲或者父亲,是否会是合格的一家之主.

sentence.Network_en: Their evolutionary rate does seem to have slowed down.
sentence.Network_cn: 它们的进化速度看来确实是慢下来了.

sentence.Network_en: Life has its own evolutionary process.
sentence.Network_cn: 生命有其自身的进化过程。

Sentence.sentence: Books—especially books the average person could afford—haven't been around long enough to produce evolutionary change in humans.
contributes to environmental protection Romantic love has clear evolutionary roots but our views about what makes an ideal romantic relationship can be swayed by the society we live in
